text: ql lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'iinama 'ana bashar mithlukum yuhi allah 'ily 'anama 'ilhkm aldhy yastahiqu alebadt, 'ilh wahid la sharik lh, faslku altariq almawsil 'ilyh, watlbu mghfrth. waeadhab lilmushrikin aladhin ebdu min dun allah awthanana laa tanfae wala tdr, waladhin lam ythru 'anfusahum btwhyd rbhm, wal'iikhlas lh, walam ysllu walam yzkku, fala 'ikhlas minhum llkhalq wala nfe fihim llkhlq, wahum la yuminun balbeth, wala bialjanat walnar, wala yunfiqun fi taeat allh
